content: 4 sts 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st **2 half_double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st repeat from ** 3 times 2 half_double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st 1 single_crochet in the next st slip_stitch to the last st weave yarn and shape into a rose and sew in to place © kool stitch 2011 this pattern is for personal use only
